about_the_game:
Trapped in an unknown space for unknown reasons, the two adventurers must now turn their teamwork for finding treasure into one for survival and escape! Will adventurers escape from the unknown space and get treasure again?

Where We Are is a multi-play puzzle game set in a mysterious incident that happened to two adventurers who found the treasure.
Two players become two adventurers and share the information given to each other to solve a puzzle to find out where they are and why they came here.

This game requires clear communication and communication skills to deliver all the information through the microphone by voice. Enjoy interesting puzzles with a real-life escape experience!

This game requires both players to have a working PC-compatible microphone.

Our game is inspired by We were Here Series.
